tweets.text:
‚ö° JOIN THE SLOW THE FLOW TEAM ‚ö°

we are looking appoint three additional, hands-on, volunteer trustees to the Board of Slow The Flow to lead on the following themes:

üëâ EDUCATION 
üëâ FUNDING
üëâ LEGAL 

Could this be you?
 https://t.co/CRJiVLwVr6
@Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/p3XnxT3wtf

@RiverActionUK @rosamundi @EnvAgency @itvnews @watsonchas @thenoblefoods Great to hear @itvnews has run this. From what I‚Äôve heard, the story of what‚Äôs happened to one of our most beautiful & important rivers should be a national scandal - an appalling failure of the @EnvAgency to protect even the best of our habitats. The boat needs to be rocked.

We‚Äôre at the end of the peatland restoration season. Recently we have been working to improve water quality and biodiversity on Shap Fells in Cumbria - here's our team in action
 @cumbriawildlife @unitedutilities @EnvAgency https://t.co/GSxdN7fZCY
@Geraint_Smith @RiverActionUK @EnvAgency @itvnews @watsonchas @thenoblefoods It seems fairly clear that the @EnvAgency aren't remotely fit for purpose.

Y'day, @metecoban92, @chrismylesk & I wrote to @EnvAgency demanding action to clean up River Lea & associated waterways. It builds on letter @jonburkeUK & I sent before.
It's unacceptable residents, wildlife & visitors have to put up with this.
Thanks to those who got in touch. https://t.co/cISAOKNhoP

This letter üëáis v welcome, thanks @mayorofhackney & also @colin_gram @HMUG_Hackney @DobbyWoods @plasticfreehkny & all who've helped bring attention to #plasticpollution #sewage on the #riverlea. We look forward to an effective response from @EnvAgency 1/9 https://t.co/adszfR3hl7

How many face coverings did you see littered on your last beach walk?

Litter spoils the places we enjoy and can make its way into the sea and possibly harm marine life.

Bring a bag for your #litter when you go outdoors and take it home to dispose of.

tweets.text: @StaffordshireCC @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @PHE_WestMids As you cannot exclude a risk to health from pollutants,when will I receive my Walleys Landfill Protect & Survive booklet?With advice like you can close doors & windows while the smell is present,then open them to ventilate when the smell has cleared. #shameful #stopthestink https://t.co/eym9eTn5p4
@annjsmall @StinkStopthe @Sian29337182 @WendyMa48697963 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @PersimmonHomes How about Acrid Avenue
@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency We'll show them a community spirit tomorrow mate.

@StaffordshireCC @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @PHE_WestMids Let's just say that if somebody was piping hydrogen sulphide into your offices and homes every day, you wouldn't be playing it down in this way. You'd do something.

@StaffordshireCC @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @PHE_WestMids After reading this I am ashamed to have paid my council tax today. I live 2 miles from the landfill. To tell me to close my windows and wait for the odour to clear before opening them again is an insult. This  odour enters my home as I sleep at night, windows & doors shut.

@1970Jdk @StinkStopthe @MissyDoom @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL Please please keep reporting, if you don‚Äôt want to phone it‚Äôs 2 mins on an email. If we give up we are sentencing ourselves to this for life
